In a World Moved by Stories
Yours Begins Here

The Power of a Medill Education

As the media industry experiences unprecedented change, Medill leads the way. We are training a new generation of multimedia journalists and integrated marketing communications professionals who are not only thriving in this evolving media landscape but also helping to shape it.

Explore Journalism Explore Integrated Marketing Communications Explore All Programs

Our Faculty

Medill faculty represent the highest levels of accomplishment in scholarship, journalism and global commerce.

They are actively involved in mentoring students and conducting research to create knowledge. Our staff and administration comprise experienced professionals, many of whom are Medill alumni.

View All Faculty

Beth Bennet

Assistant Professor and Director of Undergraduate Journalism Program

Twitter LinkedIn

The five-course certificate program features core courses in consumer insight, research and IMC strategy as well as a variety of electives that enable Northwestern undergraduates to enhance their majors with a specialization in IMC.

Undergraduate Journalism Program

A Global Presence

Medill is, and always will be, more than a specific location or singular experience. The school has programs in Evanston, Chicago and Washington, D.C., and is opening a new space in the San Francisco Bay Area.

Medill faculty and students are also an important part of the Northwestern University program in Qatar.

Google Map

Medill Across the Globe

Learning through experience is at the heart of a Medill education. By learning in the world rather than just about the world, our global programs broaden your perspective and prepare you for a career in rapidly changing and interconnected markets.

Research Centers and Labs

Innovation Through Application

Learn to use data and technology to uncover insights and shape our world.

JIMC Spiegel Digital and Database Research Center

The five-course certificate program features core courses in consumer insight, research and IMC strategy as well as a variety of electives that enable Northwestern undergraduates to enhance their majors with a specialization in IMC.

Learn More

Medill Knight Lab

The Knight Lab is a joint initiative of Northwestern’s Medill School of Journalism and the Robert R. McCormick School of Engineering and Applied Science. It combines the disciplines of journalism and computer science together to establish a cutting edge media innovation lab, one of the only ones of its kind.

Learn More
